answers.answer: Same thing happend to me but dont usually the first one always comes out high...youll see itll be negative. ..only difference is that you have to cut back in eating a lot of things that you usually do...so its just a diet and you have to check your sugar levels
I failed my one hour one, then had to have the three hour one, then passed.
I'm really hoping I pass it, I'm waiting now, I've never failed before but I have been eating a lot of german chocolate cake lol
What is it exactly that they test for I have mine in a month n I have no idea what it is!!? Ftm if u couldn't tell
And what happens if you fail???

If you fail the 1 hr then you take the 3 hr... Of you fail that then you have gestational diabetes and have to monitor your diet, check your blood sugar, and depending on severity you may need insulin injections
thank goodness!!! I passed the three hour!!
